issue.body:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Version: 2.0.20.23

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

wetter.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Cookie banner doesnt get removed

2. Screenshots

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce the ads. But  this issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

In the case of safari, you can install the AdGuard desktop app or try another browser

comment.body:
For the wetter update these rules are required (but click on it will auto-close, extension sadly not showing the popup rule):
```
wetter.com#@#div[data-ad-type]
@@||pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/adx$domain=wetter.com
pubads.g.doubleclick.net#@#a[href*="/adclick."]
pubads.g.doubleclick.net#@#a[href^="https://adclick.g.doubleclick.net/"]
```

But unsure if we should unblock those though.

Fixed left-overs.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
Please ensure that `Advanced protection` is enabled and if so, then please check with third-party filter lists disabled:
```
EasyPrivacy
Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List
Peter Lowe's Blocklist
Fanboy's Social Blocking List
Adblock Warning Removal List
Fanboy's Annoyances
Web Annoyances Ultralist
I don't care about cookies
EasyList Cookie List
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List
Bulgarian list
EasyList Czech and Slovak
EasyList Hebrew
EasyList Italy
EasyList Lithuania
Latvian List
Liste AR
AdBlockID
EasyList Thailand
Hungarian
ABPVN List
Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard
Estonian List
List-KR
Adblock List for Finland
Persian Blocker
Polish Anti Adblock Filters
Frellwit's Swedish Filter
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filter
```

By the way, please also disable `EasyList`, it's included in `AdGuard Base` filter.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Version: 2.0.20.23

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

wetter.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Cookie banner doesnt get removed

comment.body:
@BlazDT I see your filters in my updated list, but none of the placeholders were fixed 🤔 Interestingly, on iPhone (where I have to click the Cookie Pop-up), there is showing the Berlin weather widget. Might have to do with the Cookie Pop-up?
Screenshot-1: ![IMG_710674282690](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/0e120245-2038-4df7-9dbc-1a4a5f7e5889)

The mobile Cookie Pop-up seems to be filtered in AdGuard German filters (instead of Annoyance). When I uncheck it, the Berlin widget loads on mobile view. However, that filter has no affect on iPhone and since it overblocks another solution might be better.

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Version: 2.0.20.23

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

wetter.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Cookie banner doesnt get removed

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/33166892/99737267-9f0c-4b1a-8c2c-624b6c9f18f9)


![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/33166892/fe0e78d3-62b5-4682-a76a-a263faddb39a)

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

### Privacy

comment.body:
I have added both rules.

- AdGuard for Windows mobile view (Firefox):
No autoclick, all placeholders are still there, as long `$$script[tag-content="Flags."][min-length="20000"][max-length="300000"]` is being used
When I exclude filter with `$@$script[tag-content="Flags."][min-length="20000"][max-length="300000"]` -> autoclick on mobile view works fine and all placeholders are not hidden

- AdGuard for iOS:
Works all fine now. Autoclick works and placeholders are hidden 👍

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` after clicking AdGuard icon in macOS menu bar and settings icon.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 macOS 메뉴 바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘과 설정 아이콘을 누르신 후에 `필터 업데이트`를 클릭함으로써 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

pull_request.title: Fix nicochannel design websites - social (/video page)
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address ### Add your comment and screenshots These websites have a common design with nicochannel. ``` https://qrpf1.com/video/smdXkC4c6yt82djp9mMnMtu6 https://hyakuta.com/video/sma3EDaYc8LMSVmzDonCPDw9 https://banbanzai-fc.com/video/smMsCtAJTfMWYwSAFyUNAeNo https://pizzaradio.jp/video/smJeMbwCrQMjpbMA7nsRjP6Q https://gs-ch.com/video/smsKpQarriwgoKZNzf6mHZia https://asato-yuya.com/video/smJceJswUD9SDQXH7AtbuKkV https://dazbee-fc.com/video/smSPsBkfmvXWeSDerYorG2Wc https://minami-hamabe.net/video/smJoFcPzKTFXooz3CqqYRiP3 https://tokinosora-fc.com/video/smnmkwH2B4cGVmQW2iSjc9fX https://keisuke-ueda.jp/video/smDqN6V5VDQvyhxwizMkHY5i ```

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address ### Add your comment and screenshots These websites have a common design with nicochannel.
screenshot(example) - qrpf1.com ![](https://i.ibb.co/NnKNX30/image.png) ![](https://i.ibb.co/dQDfDH8/image.png)

``` https://qrpf1.com/articles/news/arLPD4jZNBxfHLynE3Ppbr23 https://hyakuta.com/articles/news/arrtHmh4XcFCRXevSeEo3MHg https://banbanzai-fc.com/articles/news/arBcBQnsB6ewXPcftk6vzHSE https://pizzaradio.jp/articles/news/ar5AaLPXayaDHujtfkSDJi2d https://gs-ch.com/articles/information/arGecNgrCeFErHyyD8jWWj2U https://p-jinriki-fc.com/articles/news/arn2bFcMAjzeaJHyyGm27qb5 ``` ### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
I understand. I will wait.

As far as I can tell from my light research, the following four domains have enough visitors.
`gs-ch.com,canan8181.com,rnqq.jp,nicochannel.jp`
I also think that the number of websites with nicochannel designs will continue to grow.

comment.body:
Checked on iPad. Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce the issue with your filters. Please make sure that all content blockers in safari are enabled. Also try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.Do not close AdGuard window 30-60 seconds. If the problem continues to occur, please write to [support@adguard.com](mailto:support@adguard.com).

> httpsフィルタリングを有効にしてみましたが、改善されませんでした。

URLバーの鍵アイコンをタップして、「この接続は保護されています」をさらにタップしてみてください。証明書の説明が出ますので、Twitterの証明書が「AdGuard Personal CA」発行のものであるか、DigiCert Global...（略）のものであるかご確認ください。

comment.body:
Is cookie showing when you add this rule?
@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$jsinject,important

If not, please try these two rules:
```
stern.de#@%#AG_onLoad(function(){try{if(-1==document.cookie.indexOf("__cmpconsent")||!localStorage.getItem("__cmpconsent")){const c=new MutationObserver(function(){const a=document.querySelector("#cmpbox .cmptxt_btn_yes");a&&(c.disconnect(),a.click())});c.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0}),setTimeout(function(){c.disconnect()},1E4)}}catch(a){}});
baseendpoint.stern.de#@%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(window.location.href.includes("consentUUID")){var a=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('button[title^="Zustimmen"]')||document.querySelector('button[title^="Alle akzeptieren" i]');b&&(a.disconnect(),b.click())});a.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){a.disconnect()},1E4)}});
```

If still not working, this rule:
`@@||baseendpoint.stern.de^$jsinject,important`
